item.title: Is Generative Recommendation the Future of RecSys?
item.author: mycaptainmy@gmail.com (Yuan Meng)
item.description:
For nearly a decade, recommender systems have remained largely the same: System-wise, a cascading design sifts through all candidates (e.g., $10^8$)

Retrieval. Some lightweight ranking. Then embedding + MLP style re-ranking. Each innovation enhances a layer in this system: input, interaction, experts, etc.. The pinnacle is DHEN, combining various powerful interaction methods. Sequence modeling injects timely information.

New trends have come and go. But you feel the tide has finally turned when many top companies start to embrace a new paradigm and put it into production. Meta, Google, Netflix, Kuaishou, Xiaohongshu, Meituan, etc..
